sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnindvdlinfopolicy ( indvdl_info_policy_id , indvdl_info_policy_cn , indvdl_info_policy_agre_at , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , indvdl_info_policy_nm ) VALUES ( #indvdlInfoPolicyId# , #indvdlInfoPolicyCn# , #indvdlInfoPolicyAgreAt# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE , #indvdlInfoPolicyNm# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnindvdlinfopolicy SET indvdl_info_policy_id = #indvdlInfoPolicyId# , indvdl_info_policy_cn = #indvdlInfoPolicyCn# , indvdl_info_policy_agre_at = #indvdlInfoPolicyAgreAt# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE , indvdl_info_policy_nm = #indvdlInfoPolicyNm# WHERE 1 = 1 AND indvdl_info_policy_id = #indvdlInfoPolicyId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnindvdlinfopolicy WHERE 1 = 1 AND indvdl_info_policy_id = #indvdlInfoPolicyId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT indvdl_info_policy_id , indvdl_info_policy_cn , indvdl_info_policy_agre_at , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , indvdl_info_policy_nm FROM COMTNINDVDLINFOPOLICY WHERE indvdl_info_policy_id = #indvdlInfoPolicyId#

SELECT A.INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_ID , A.INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_CN , A.INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_AGRE_AT , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_NM FROM ( SELECT INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_ID , INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_CN , INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_AGRE_AT , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_NM , ROWNUM FROM COMTNINDVDLINFOPOLICY WHERE 1=1
INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_ID = #searchKeyword#
INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_CN LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNINDVDLINFOPOLICY WHERE 1=1
INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_ID = #searchKeyword#
INDVDL_INFO_POLICY_CN LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
